intro.p: You can specify and preview the workflow in the configuration dialog, and it will be executed within KNIME.

Currently the KNIME workflow variables, table properties or flow variables are not supported within RapidMiner node, you should use KNIME nodes to extract that information and pass them as a table to RapidMiner.

fullDescription.option: The location of the (initial) RapidMiner process.
Should an edited process be executed?
If checked, the process will always be reloaded from the location, else the state when the location was opened, or when last edited will be used.
Reloads the process from the location.
Save the currently edited process to a new file.
You can specify the RapidMiner process within the editor.

You can specify with this option Row ID attribute name in the RapidMiner process, although this is optional. If not available after execution, automatically generated id will be in the resulting tables. If there are duplicates in the resulting column, an error will be reported, and the node execution will fail.
